= Development Environment =

== Eclipse Setup ==

  # Download Eclipse Indigo: Select your OS on the right-hand side. http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/indigosr1
  # Extract the compressed file and put the resulting eclipse directory in a convenient place.
  # Run the eclipse executable in the eclipse directory. (Maybe Windows version comes with an installer and creates a shortcut)
  # Help > Install New Software...
  # Enter http://download.eclipse.org/technology/subversive/0.7/update-site/ to "Work with" and press enter
  # Select "Subversive SVN Team Provider Plugin (Incubation)"
  # Next, Next, Finish

== Subversive Plugin Setup ==
  # File > Import
  # Select "Project from SVN"
  # Install SVN Connector SVN Kit 1.3.5
  # URL: https://swe574group2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
  # Enter your e-mail as the user name and find your password from: https://code.google.com/hosting/settings

== Play Eclipse Plugin Setup ==
  To install, copy the JAR file from $PLAY_HOME/support/eclipse to $ECLIPSE_HOME/dropins.
